snippet.title: Even the Ocean Holiday Trailer
snippet.description:
A preview trailer for the new game, Even the Ocean, by  the creators of the game 'Anodyne' (2013).

---


Follow Aliph, a technician for Whiteforge City, as she investigates a recent string of power plant failures!
Hike across beautiful and strange geography, leap through dangerous and broken-down power plants, and navigate color-coded obstacles to balance Aliph's 2-way energy bar.

"Everyone's histories, even the ocean's.
When they've gone,
wouldn't they be nice for others to know?"

---
Join the mailing list and learn more: http://www.eventheocean.com/mail.html

Follow the game on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/eventheocean

Like the game on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/eventheocean

Read development updates: http://forums.tigsource.com/index.php...
---




---



Even the Ocean is created with the Haxe programming language, the OpenFL and HaxeFlixel game development framework, and the FlashDevelop IDE.

All Rights Reserved. Copyright Analgesic Productions LLC, 2013-2016.
